Text: HI _ How to make a DVD of this  . MKV??

This torrent sucks. Cannot even make a decode! System hangs every time!
Next time try a normal format.
Waste of a download, sadly: it just doesn't work.

MKV is the stupidest, most irritating, and utterly worthless format ever conceived.  It's virtually impossible to convert it to a format which can be burned on to a normal DVD.  A huge waste of time, especially as this is a really good film with a superb cast.
